channel.title: [PI] Interface not popping up in zone [PI]

item.title: [PI] Interface not popping up in zone [PI]
item.dc:creator: @valcombird valcombird
item.description:
@valcombird wrote:

Ok, I was putting the interface in from my fight pits into another area. I just copied and pasted it. I changed all that was needed to change then I compiled/reset server… But when I go to zone. Its either the original interface (With like the original text of it showing) or just plain old nothing.

Heres the code of it…

[code]public void updateWaitRoom() {
	for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
			Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			if (c.getPA().inBroodooWait()) {
				c.getPA().sendQuest("Broodoo Mini-Game", 15894);
				c.getPA().sendQuest("People in lobby: " + playersInWaiting() + "", 15895);
				c.getPA().sendQuest("Broodoo Points : " + c.dungPoints + "", 15897);
				c.getPA().sendQuest("",15898);
				c.getPA().sendQuest("Broodoo Level: " +c.playerLevel[22]+ "", 15899); 
				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15896);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15900);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15901);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15902);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15903);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15904);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15905);
    				c.getPA().sendQuest("", 15906);
				c.getPA().walkableInterface(15892);
				
			}
		}
	}	
}[/code]

Fight pits has the same thing just different wording in the quotes. Anyway I can fix this? And when I try to put the walkableinterface into PA. It pops up as the original interface not the new one. Fix please?
